dialogOption.texten: 911, what's your emergency?
Dude, I have a p ...
{WHAT HAPPENED} I am sorry what do you mean?
I said that my head hurts terribly! I drank all day yesterday with my brother in law, and I woke up now ....
{IT'S 911} You know, that you got through to 911 right?
I know, I ain't stupid.
{ARE YOU HURT?} Are you hurt?
Yea...No! ...but my head hurts terribly, I told you that. I ran out of my drugs.
{IT'S NOT EMERGENCY} Please do not call if there is nothing serious. It's for emergencies only.
But my head hurts terribly!
{NO INTERVENTION} Sir, we do not send an ambulance for a hangover.
Eeeewwww.... go fuck yourself...
{WHERE?} Sir where are you calling from?
From home!
{NO AMBULANCE!} There is no way I can send an ambulance.
What? I am in need! I write a complaint, spivs! You get a salary from my taxes!
{BE PRECISE} Okay, and where would that be?
At [[ADDRESS]] !!!
{NUMBER?} And the flat number?
{I'LL SEND AMBULANCE} Alright, we will send ambulance there.
Yeah get here! I ain't gonna wait all day!
So? I ain't gonna wait all day.
You there?

DialogOption.texten: This call is part of OtL. Please visit github.com/SoharicMedia/OtL/issues to report this issue.

reportElement.texten: The caller was drunk. He called an ambulance, but intervention was not necessary
The team was not happy to deal with this case.
The caller was reminded by the police not to call 911 unnecessarily
